alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Madison (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 5:58PM EDT until July 17 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN MADISON AND NORTHEASTERN HAMILTON COUNTIES... At 558 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Noblesville, or 10 miles west of Anderson, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Lapel around 605 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Edgewood, Woodlawn Heights, River Forest and Pendleton. This includes Interstate 69 between mile markers 218 and 230. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
